title: Family mourns Nigerian pilgrim who fled Boko Haram but died in Haj crush
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
KADUNA, Nigeria (Reuters) - Three years after his family fled their northeastern Nigerian home to escape threats from Boko Haram militants, ...
